import React, { Component } from "react"; class Form extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { name: '', adress: '', } this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this) this.adressFunction = this.adressFunction.bind(this) } handleChange(event) { let textDigitado = event.target.value.toUpperCase(); this.setState({name:textDigitado}) } adressFunction(event) { let enderecoDigitado = event.target.value; enderecoDigitado.replace('/[^a-zA-Zs]/g', ""); this.setState({adress:enderecoDigitado}) } render() { const {name} = this.state; const {adress} = this.state; return ( <> Meu formulário
Casa Apartamento
); } } export default Form;
